name: Vampanzer Prototype
description:
Prototype I made for 2018 game by it's cover jam.

The idea was you play as a vampire princess, and fight an army of angels to save your girlfriend. While in the tank you can take a lot of damage, and have heavy firepower, and while out of the tank you're pretty weak, but can fly and traverse tight spaces.

-CONTROLS-

WASD - move
E-enter/exit tank
L - jump
K- shoot
J- boost (while in tank)

Maybe I'll bring back this idea someday ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

made with Game Maker 2
